channel.title: cdsctl on CDS Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in cdsctl on CDS Documentation

item.title: login
item.description: cdsctl login Login to CDS Synopsis Login to CDS cdsctl login [flags] Options -H, --api-url string CDS API URL --env Display the commands to set up the environment for the cds client -h, --help help for login -p, --password string CDS Password -u, --username string CDS Username Options inherited from parent commands -f, --file string set configuration file -k, --insecure (SSL) This option explicitly allows curl to perform "insecure" SSL connections and transfers.

item.title: monitoring
item.description: cdsctl monitoring CDS monitoring Synopsis CDS monitoring cdsctl monitoring [flags] Options -h, --help help for monitoring Options inherited from parent commands -f, --file string set configuration file -k, --insecure (SSL) This option explicitly allows curl to perform "insecure" SSL connections and transfers. -w, --no-warnings do not display warnings -v, --verbose verbose output SEE ALSO cdsctl - CDS Command line utility

item.title: signup
item.description: cdsctl signup Signup on CDS Synopsis Signup on CDS cdsctl signup [flags] Options -H, --api-url string CDS API URL --email string Email --fullname string Fullname -h, --help help for signup --username string CDS Username Options inherited from parent commands -f, --file string set configuration file -k, --insecure (SSL) This option explicitly allows curl to perform "insecure" SSL connections and transfers. -w, --no-warnings do not display warnings -v, --verbose verbose output SEE ALSO cdsctl - CDS Command line utility

item.title: update
item.description: cdsctl update Update cdsctl from CDS API or from CDS Release Synopsis Update cdsctl from CDS API or from CDS Release cdsctl update [flags] Options --from-github Update binary from latest github release -h, --help help for update Options inherited from parent commands -f, --file string set configuration file -k, --insecure (SSL) This option explicitly allows curl to perform "insecure" SSL connections and transfers. -w, --no-warnings do not display warnings -v, --verbose verbose output SEE ALSO cdsctl - CDS Command line utility

item.title: version
item.description: cdsctl version show cdsctl version Synopsis show cdsctl version cdsctl version [flags] Options -h, --help help for version Options inherited from parent commands -f, --file string set configuration file -k, --insecure (SSL) This option explicitly allows curl to perform "insecure" SSL connections and transfers. -w, --no-warnings do not display warnings -v, --verbose verbose output SEE ALSO cdsctl - CDS Command line utility
